mapper.sql: SELECT bae.id book_audio_episode_id, bae.title book_audio_episode_title, bae.episode_id book_audio_episode_episode_id, bae.media_number book_audio_episode_media_number, bae.duration book_audio_episode_duration, bae.status book_audio_episode_status, bae.book_id book_audio_episode_book_id, bae.commodity_id book_audio_episode_commodity_id, bae.stream_url book_audio_episode_stream_url, bae.next_episode_id book_audio_episode_next_episode_id, bae.deleted book_audio_episode_deleted, bae.create_time book_audio_episode_create_time, bae.update_time book_audio_episode_update_time, b.id book_id, b.title book_title, b.description book_description, b.cover book_cover, b.teller book_teller, b.category_id book_category_id, b.publish_year book_publish_year, b.type book_type, b.episodes book_episodes, b.status book_status, b.money book_money, bm.id book_metadata_id, bm.name book_metadata_name, bm.cover book_metadata_cover, bm.description book_metadata_description, bm.words book_metadata_words, bm.author book_metadata_author, be.id book_episode_id, be.title book_episode_title, be.episode_number book_episode_episode_number, be.content_type book_episode_content_type, be.content_source book_episode_content_source, be.words book_episode_words, be.status book_episode_status, be.create_time book_episode_create_time, be.update_time book_episode_update_time, c.id category_id, c.name category_name, c.description category_description, c.extra_url category_extra_url, c.extra_aside_title category_extra_aside_title FROM book_audio_episode bae LEFT JOIN book_episode be ON bae.episode_id = be.id LEFT JOIN book b ON bae.book_id = b.id LEFT JOIN book_metadata bm ON b.metadata_id = bm.id LEFT JOIN category c ON b.category_id = c.id WHERE bae.deleted = 0
